author: mattbaird
msg: close broker so we don't have a locking issue.

author: thma
msg: add Rajeev Kauls Oracle SeqMan. Made it work with a special custom attribute

author: olegnitz
msg: Sybase ASE doesn't support SQL-92 OUTER JOIN syntax.

author: olegnitz
msg: CollectionProxy and IndirectionHandler now use the current PersistentBroker
instead of creating a new one whenever possible. Previous behavior sometimes
lead to blocking with MS SQL Server. Also this decreases the number of open connections.
